name: DO_OR_DIE Hunt to Survive
description:
This is the third-person shooter game.
Fight with different shooting weapons and abilities.

Connect with your friends and strangers to play the game.
Play two different maps and modes.
Enter the level with your companions and solo to pick up different types of weapons, weapon ammo, and some powerup player abilities buff.

How to connect players in-game



First, choose the number of players and the map.
Press the "Host" button to create a match. It will take you to the lobby level and wait for another player to connect.
On Another side of the player make sure to press the "Join" button.

If Else, you change the settings and play the emotes in the menu then quit the game and restart to join or host.
In future updates, all make to improve the game.

free For All - Map


This Map will Connect all the Players you choose to play with solo and competitively.
It has a playing time and Score to calculate the winners.

teams - Map


Get the number of players in the menu and connect them to the team level.
This map will divide the players into their teams.
Red Team and Blue Team.
Also, have time to choose winners.

No In-game Purchases and Micro Transactions.
